name: Furry Fury
Lore: '''All right, don''t lose your temper.'' Hoth hath no fury like a Wookiee scorned.',
Text: 'USED: Cancel Wookiee Roar or Han''s Back or Life Debt.LOST: If Han and Chewie are in a battle together, draw two destiny. Subtract total from opponent''s attrition and total power (cannot fall below zero).',
